creator: vittorio_ognissanti@hotmail.com
text:
I am using Apache Web Server as localhost to study php 4 & mysql ; I am looking 
for instruction or a manual on how to deal with .htpasswd feature related to 
the file htpasswd.exe and htdigest.exe in the folder bin of my windows 98 
installation. Apache/1.3.12 (Win32)
Please help
vittorio ognissanti

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
Since this is a support question, and not a bug report, please use one
of our user-support resources:
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

Thanks for using Apache!
